articles.title: ADB trims growth outlook for developing Asia as headwinds persist - Reuters
articles.description: The Asian Development Bank cut its growth forecasts for developing Asia for this year and next as the region faces persistent headwinds from the Russia-Ukraine conflict, China's COVID-19 policies, and a slowing global economy.
articles.content: MANILA, Dec 14 (Reuters) - The Asian Development Bank cut its growth forecasts for developing Asia for this year and next as the region faces persistent headwinds from the Russia-Ukraine conflict, Ch… [+1702 chars]

articles.title: Indian and Chinese soldiers injured in Himalayan mountain border clash - ABC News
articles.description: A border scuffle in the Himalayas between the two nuclear-armed Asian giants resulted in minor injuries but no casualties, India's defence minister says.
articles.content: Indian troops prevented Chinese soldiers from entering Indian territory on December 9 during a border scuffle that led to injuries on both sides, India's Defence Minister said on Tuesday, announcing … [+3776 chars]
